talents.name: Pressurized Glands
talents.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Survival Instincts
talents.description: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

talents.name: Regenerative Microbes
talents.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 68 Health per second over 4 seconds.

talents.name: Envenomed Nest
talents.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

talents.name: Prolific Dispersal
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

talents.name: Ballistospores
talents.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

talents.name: Sustained Carapace
talents.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

talents.name: Adrenal Overload
talents.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

talents.name: Needlespine
talents.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

talents.name: Vile Nest
talents.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Networked Carapace
talents.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

talents.name: Calldown: MULE
talents.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

talents.name: Ultimate Evolution
talents.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

talents.name: Evolve Monstrosity
talents.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 1% less damage from non-Heroic enemies. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

talents.name: Assault Strain
talents.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 102 damage.

talents.name: Bombard Strain
talents.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

talents.name: Spatial Efficiency
talents.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Soma Transference
talents.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 Health per enemy Hero hit.

talents.name: Envenomed Spikes
talents.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Adrenaline Boost
talents.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

talents.name: Locust Brood
talents.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

talents.name: Volatile Mutation
talents.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

talents.name: Evolutionary Link
talents.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

talents.name: Evolution Complete
talents.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

talents.name: Hivemind
talents.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

talents.name: Locust Nest
talents.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

talents.name: Sustaining Power
talents.description: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

talents.name: Extended Lightning
talents.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

talents.name: Ruthless Momentum
talents.description: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.

talents.name: Chaos Reigns
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

talents.name: Negatively Charged
talents.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

talents.name: Show of Force
talents.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 77 damage.

talents.name: Dissonance
talents.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Hindered Motion
talents.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Applied Force
talents.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

talents.name: Deadly Charge
talents.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

talents.name: Counter-Strike
talents.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

talents.name: Blade of the Highlord
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

talents.name: Pure Malice
talents.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%. Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

talents.name: Rite of Rak’Shir
talents.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds. Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds. Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

talents.name: Lethal Onslaught
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

talents.name: Lightning Barrage
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

talents.name: Mocking Strikes
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Counter-Strike
talents.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage. This ability will take over your Trait button.

talents.name: Deadly Charge
talents.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

talents.name: Last Laugh
talents.description: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

talents.name: Hasty Bargain
talents.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism bonus by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

talents.name: Resilient Scarabs
talents.description: Beetles have 50 Spell Armor.

talents.name: Nerubian Armor
talents.description: Every 12 seconds, gain 30 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 30%.

talents.name: Regeneration Master
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 5 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

talents.name: Bed of Barbs
talents.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

talents.name: Shed Exoskeleton
talents.description: Gain 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Underking
talents.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

talents.name: Legion of Beetles
talents.description: Automatically spawn a Beetle every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.

talents.name: Chitinous Plating
talents.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 seconds, up to 3 seconds.

talents.name: Subterranean Shield
talents.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 point shield for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Leeching Scarabs
talents.description: Beetles gain 20% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

talents.name: Locust Swarm
talents.description: Deal 62 damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 21 Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

talents.name: Cocoon
talents.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

talents.name: Burning Rage
talents.description: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Urticating Spines
talents.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

talents.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Epicenter
talents.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1.25 seconds for each Hero hit.

talents.name: Debilitation
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Beetle, Juiced
talents.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

talents.name: Hive Master
talents.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 37 health.

talents.name: Cryptweave
talents.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

talents.name: Nullification Shield
talents.description: Activate to gain 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: Reactive Parry
talents.description: Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Amateur Opponent
talents.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

talents.name: Seasoned Marksman
talents.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

talents.name: Psionic Synergy
talents.description: Increases Blade Dash's cooldown reduction of Shield Overload by hitting Heroes by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Shield Battery
talents.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 50% faster while its shield is active, and the shield duration is increased by 1 second.

talents.name: Shield Surge
talents.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

talents.name: Solarite Reaper
talents.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

talents.name: Warp Sickness
talents.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Chrono Surge
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 50% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Follow Through
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: Suppression Pulse
talents.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

talents.name: Purifier Beam
talents.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

talents.name: Templar's Zeal
talents.description: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 425.6667% faster while below 50% Health.

talents.name: Triple Strike
talents.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Graviton Vortex
talents.description: Phase Prism pulls and damages an additional enemy Hero near the first, and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: Phase Bulwark
talents.description: When Shield Overload activates, gain 40 Spell Armor for 4 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

talents.name: Zealot Charge
talents.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

talents.name: Titan Killer
talents.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

talents.name: Psionic Wound
talents.description: Twin Blades final strike lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: Plasma Burn
talents.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 55 damage per second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Orbital Bombardment
talents.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

talents.name: Target Purified
talents.description: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

talents.name: Force of Will
talents.description: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

talents.name: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: Eternal Hunger
talents.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

talents.name: Frost Presence
talents.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%. Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

talents.name: Rime
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%. Stores up to 3 charges.

talents.name: Frozen Wastes
talents.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second. Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

talents.name: Icy Talons
talents.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

talents.name: Deathlord
talents.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

talents.name: Rune Tap
talents.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 3.9% of his max Health.

talents.name: Immortal Coil
talents.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

talents.name: Icebound Fortitude
talents.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Army of the Dead
talents.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 Health.

talents.name: Summon Sindragosa
talents.description: Deals 230 damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

talents.name: Shattered Armor
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Frost Strike
talents.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Biting Cold
talents.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

talents.name: Remorseless Winter
talents.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

talents.name: Frostmourne Feeds
talents.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

talents.name: Embrace Death
talents.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

talents.name: Legion of Northrend
talents.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

talents.name: Absolute Zero
talents.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

talents.name: Death's Advance
talents.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

talents.name: Anti-Magic Shell
talents.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

talents.name: Swift Sweep
talents.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

talents.name: Increasing Clarity
talents.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 150.

talents.name: Righteous Assault
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

talents.name: Searing Light
talents.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

talents.name: Majestic Span
talents.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

talents.name: Heavy Burden
talents.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after the stun.

talents.name: Repeated Offense
talents.description: Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60. Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

talents.name: Glimmer of Hope
talents.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

talents.name: Empathic Link
talents.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

talents.name: Energized Cord
talents.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 50% of the damage against non-Heroes. Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

talents.name: Resurrect
talents.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

talents.name: Crystal Aegis
talents.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 270 damage to all nearby enemies.

talents.name: Blinding Flash
talents.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2.25 seconds.

talents.name: Converging Force
talents.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

talents.name: Piercing Lash
talents.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

talents.name: Repelling Strike
talents.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

talents.name: Reservoir of Hope
talents.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

talents.name: Will of Heaven
talents.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

talents.name: Wrath of Heaven
talents.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

talents.name: Light Speed
talents.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds. While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

talents.name: Diamond Resolve
talents.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 50 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Angelic Flight
talents.description: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

talents.name: Shield of Hope
talents.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

talents.name: Taste for Blood
talents.description: Quest: Kill enemy Minions and Heroes within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation. Reward: Enemy Minions that die increase its damage by 2. Reward: Enemy Heroes that die increase its damage by 10. Maximum bonus damage of 500.

talents.name: Sieging Wrath
talents.description: Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 4, up to 100. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

talents.name: Master of Destruction
talents.description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Every 1.5 seconds spent channeling increases the range by 8.4615%, to a maximum of 25.3846%.

talents.name: Gluttony
talents.description: All Shall Burn heals Azmodan for 25% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: Army of Hell
talents.description: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

talents.name: Hellish Hirelings
talents.description: The damage bonus from General of Hell is doubled on Mercenaries.

talents.name: Sin's Grasp
talents.description: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 247.5 damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

talents.name: Infernal Globe
talents.description: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

talents.name: Bound Minion
talents.description: Using General of Hell on a Minion grants them 75 Armor from non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take by 75%, while also  increasing the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

talents.name: Gluttonous Ward
talents.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3.276% of Azmodan's maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

talents.name: March of Sin
talents.description: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

talents.name: Demonic Invasion
talents.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 damage and have 365 health.

talents.name: Black Pool
talents.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Hellforged Armor
talents.description: Demon Warriors deal 10 damage to nearby enemies every second and are granted 50 Armor against non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take 50%.

talents.name: Hedonism
talents.description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

talents.name: Infused Power
talents.description: All Shall Burn's damage growth maximum is increased by 40%.

talents.name: Battleborn
talents.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

talents.name: Demonic Smite
talents.description: Every 7.5 seconds, the Demon Lieutenant will blast a non-Heroic unit dealing 411 damage.

talents.name: Sin for Sin
talents.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

talents.name: Perishing Flame
talents.description: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 damage to nearby enemies. Deals 100% increased damage to Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters, and Structures.

talents.name: Fifth Circle
talents.description: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Bolt of the Storm
talents.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talents.name: Forced Recruitment
talents.description: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

talents.name: Dream Shot
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Arcane Flare by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit by the outer radius, and 3 seconds for each hit by the inner radius.

talents.name: Unfurling Spray
talents.description: Increases Soothing Mist's range by 20%.

talents.name: Hyper Shift
talents.description: Each allied Hero healed by Soothing Mist reduces the cooldown of Phase Shift by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Pixie Charm
talents.description: Each time Brightwing heals an Allied Hero with Soothing Mist, she gains a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

talents.name: Arcane Barrage
talents.description: Increases the range of Arcane Flare by 50%.

talents.name: Unstable Anomaly
talents.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 114 damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

talents.name: Manic Pixie
talents.description: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 104 over 4 seconds.

talents.name: Peekaboo!
talents.description: Phase Shifting to an ally reveals a large area around them and all enemies in it for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Mistified
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 0.5 seconds every time Brightwing casts a Basic Ability.

talents.name: Phase Shield
talents.description: After finishing the teleport, the target of Brightwing's Phase Shift gains a 400 point Shield for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Cleanse
talents.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

talents.name: Blink Heal
talents.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Emerald Wind
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 damage and pushing enemies away.  Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

talents.name: Sticky Flare
talents.description: Enemies hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Pixie Boost
talents.description: Pixie Dust gives 50% bonus Move Speed, decaying to 20% over 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Shield Dust
talents.description: Pixie Dust grants 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Physical damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Ice Block
talents.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Greater Polymorph
talents.description: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Critterize
talents.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

talents.name: Bouncy Dust
talents.description: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

talents.name: Hardened Focus
talents.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

talents.name: Double Wyrmhole
talents.description: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

talents.name: Continuous Winds
talents.description: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage. Also further increases the healing bonus of Soothing Mist by 7%.

talents.name: Revitalizing Mist
talents.description: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

talents.name: Storm Shield
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Thunderstroke
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 75. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

talents.name: True Sight
talents.description: Quest: Damage Blinded enemy Heroes 60 times with Abilities or Basic Attacks. Reward: Increase Blinding Light's Blind duration by 1 second. Passive: Increase Blinding Light's passive damage bonus by 15%.

talents.name: Charged Strikes
talents.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

talents.name: Inner Light
talents.description: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.This effect has a 6 second cooldown. Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

talents.name: Ring of the Leech
talents.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

talents.name: Plate of the Whale
talents.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

talents.name: Impale
talents.description: Enemies below 50% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

talents.name: War Traveler
talents.description: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 20%. This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

talents.name: Surge of Light
talents.description: After taking 500 damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 225 damage to enemies around her.

talents.name: Ball Lightning
talents.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 damage to enemies hit.

talents.name: Valkyrie
talents.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

talents.name: Grounding Bolt
talents.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Thundergod's Vigor
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Seraph's Hymn
talents.description: Reduce Blinding Light's Mana cost from 70 to 40. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Lunging Strike
talents.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Pierce
talents.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

talents.name: Penetrate
talents.description: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

talents.name: Martial Law
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: Infinite Lightning
talents.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

talents.name: Imprisoning Light
talents.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Titan's Revenge
talents.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.

talents.name: Accumulating Flame
talents.description: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 25 Armor for 1 second per Hero Ignited, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: Grounding Brew
talents.description: Fortifying Brew grants 30 Spell Armor while drinking, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%.

talents.name: Freshest Ingredients
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

talents.name: Elusive Brawler
talents.description: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Deadly Strike
talents.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

talents.name: Keg Toss
talents.description: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 3, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

talents.name: Ring of Fire
talents.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Brewmaster's Balance
talents.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 Health per second.

talents.name: Bolder Flavor
talents.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 318. Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

talents.name: Purifying Brew
talents.description: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 45 seconds.

talents.name: Wandering Keg
talents.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
talents.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed.  Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

talents.name: Pressure Point
talents.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

talents.name: A Touch of Honey
talents.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

talents.name: Withering Flames
talents.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 20% for  seconds.

talents.name: Flying Leap
talents.description: Increases Flying Kick's range by 15%.

talents.name: Another Round
talents.description: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Enough to Share
talents.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 per second.

talents.name: Untapped Potential
talents.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Elemental Conduit
talents.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities. Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable.  Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.  Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

talents.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
talents.description: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

talents.name: Consuming Fire
talents.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

talents.name: Fuel for the Flame
talents.description: Quest: Every minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%. Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

talents.name: Calloused Hide
talents.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

talents.name: Uppercut
talents.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

talents.name: Rollback
talents.description: Rune Bomb continues to travel after detonation, and will roll back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

talents.name: Seared Flesh
talents.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

talents.name: Power Surge
talents.description: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds.

talents.name: Firestarter
talents.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second. Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Enraged Regeneration
talents.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's health regeneration is increased by 200%.

talents.name: Hammer of Twilight
talents.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 damage, pushing enemies away, and stuning them for 0.75 seconds. Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

talents.name: Upheaval
talents.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

talents.name: Frenzied Fists
talents.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

talents.name: Runic Feedback
talents.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

talents.name: Runed Gauntlet
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Surging Dash
talents.description: While channeling Surging Fist, Cho is Unstoppable and heals for 150 Health per second.

talents.name: Twilight Veil
talents.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 300% for 2 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

talents.name: Molten Block
talents.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 damage per second.

talents.name: C'thun's Gift
talents.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Favor of the Old Gods
talents.description: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: The Will of Cho
talents.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

talents.name: Hour of Twilight
talents.description: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

talents.name: Compounding Aether
talents.description: Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes with Sand Blast, increase its damage by 100.

talents.name: Deep Breathing
talents.description: Quest: Every time Dragon’s Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 150 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

talents.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
talents.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chromie's Mana Regeneration by 0.1, up to 1.5. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes Chromie also gains 5% Ability Power.

talents.name: Piercing Sands
talents.description: Sand Blast will now hit the first two Heroes in its path.

talents.name: Bronze Talons
talents.description: Increases Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.

talents.name: Enveloping Assault
talents.description: Increases Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

talents.name: Mobius Loop
talents.description: Reduces Dragon’s Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

talents.name: Dragon’s Eye
talents.description: Dragon’s Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

talents.name: Chrono Sickness
talents.description: Reduces Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Slowing Sands
talents.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

talents.name: Temporal Loop
talents.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

talents.name: Bye Bye!
talents.description: Reduces the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

talents.name: Reaching through Time
talents.description: Increases Sand Blast and Dragon’s Breath's range by 15%.

talents.name: Time Out
talents.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

talents.name: Shifting Sands
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast increases Chromie's Ability Power by 8% for the next 10 seconds. This bonus can be stacked up to 40%, and the duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

talents.name: Fast Forward
talents.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Quantum Overdrive
talents.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 20% for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Pocket of Time
talents.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 60% to 80%.

talents.name: Loophole
talents.description: Temporal Loop hits all enemy Heroes near the initial target.

talents.name: Past and Future Me
talents.description: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie leaves an echo of herself behind. The next time Sand Blast is cast, the echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that does 40% damage.

talents.name: Andorhal Anomaly
talents.description: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

talents.name: Rush-down
talents.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 5 seconds.

talents.name: Hit the Nitrous
talents.description: Initial speed of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

talents.name: Crash Course
talents.description: Quest:Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters. Reward: After damaging 25 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

talents.name: Pro Moves
talents.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.25 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

talents.name: Diverting Power
talents.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by an additional 50% for the duration.

talents.name: Get Through This!
talents.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Fusion Generator
talents.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%. Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

talents.name: Bring It On
talents.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

talents.name: Coming Through
talents.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

talents.name: Dazer Zone
talents.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

talents.name: Aggression Matrix
talents.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

talents.name: Nuclear Option
talents.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 50%. A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

talents.name: Bunny Hop
talents.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds. Requires Mech Mode.

talents.name: Big Shot
talents.description: Deal 250 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit. Requires Pilot Mode.

talents.name: Expensive Plating
talents.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds. This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

talents.name: Emergency Shielding
talents.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 damage over 6 seconds. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

talents.name: Ablative Armor
talents.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health are reduced by 50%. This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

talents.name: Torpedo Dash
talents.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies. Requires Pilot Mode.

talents.name: GG, WP
talents.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

talents.name: Nanoweave Suit
talents.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

talents.name: Suppressing Fire
talents.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Stop and Pop
talents.description: Bunny Hop deals 150% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

talents.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
talents.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

talents.name: Concussive Pulse
talents.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back. Requires Pilot Mode.

talents.name: MEKAfall
talents.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 damage to enemies in the impact area.

talents.name: Enduring Swarm
talents.description: Dark Swarm grants 40 Spell Armor, reducing Ability damage taken by 40%.

talents.name: Tissue Regeneration
talents.description: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

talents.name: Enhanced Agility
talents.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

talents.name: Lurker Strain
talents.description: Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: One-Who-Collects
talents.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

talents.name: Hero Stalker
talents.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%.

talents.name: Feeding Frenzy
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Constriction
talents.description: Increases Drag duration by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Symbiosis
talents.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

talents.name: Isolation
talents.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Adaptation
talents.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

talents.name: Primal Rage
talents.description: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

talents.name: Ferocious Stalker
talents.description: Dark Swarm deals 40% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

talents.name: Primal Swarm
talents.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

talents.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
talents.description: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

talents.name: Elongated Tongue
talents.description: Increase Drag range by 20%.

talents.name: Tunneling Claws
talents.description: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.

talents.name: Contagion
talents.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

talents.name: Change Is Survival
talents.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

talents.name: Apex Predator
talents.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Essence Claws
talents.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

talents.name: Bulwark
talents.description: Increases the duration of Armor granted by Shadow Charge from 2 seconds to 4 seconds.

talents.name: Devil's Due
talents.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2% per Soul.

talents.name: Life Leech
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Diablo for the same amount.

talents.name: From the Shadows
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Shadow Charge by 40%.

talents.name: Speed Demon
talents.description: Being Stunned or Rooted increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Demonic Strength
talents.description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Soul Feast
talents.description: Black Soulstone increases Diablo's Health Regeneration by 0.4 per second per Soul.

talents.name: Soul Shield
talents.description: Black Soulstone grants Diablo 0.25 Spell Armor per soul, reducing Ability Damage taken by 0.25% per Soul.

talents.name: Diabolical Momentum
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Overpower and Shadow Charge by 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Apocalypse
talents.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

talents.name: Lightning Breath
talents.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

talents.name: Devastating Charge
talents.description: Shadow Charge's terrain collision against Heroes deals an additional 5% of the target's maximum life. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase the maximum life damage by 2%, to a maximum of 10% bonus.

talents.name: Fire Devil
talents.description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Basic Attack damage by 20% and surrounds Diablo in flames that deal 20 damage every second. Lasts 6 seconds.

talents.name: Hellfire
talents.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp increases the damage of the next Fire Stomp by 12%, up to 120%.

talents.name: Debilitating Flames
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are slowed by 15% for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

talents.name: Domination
talents.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

talents.name: Fearful Presence
talents.description: Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Dying Breath
talents.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

talents.name: Hellstorm
talents.description: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.

talents.name: Lord of Terror
talents.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

talents.name: Hellgate
talents.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

talents.name: Guitar Hero
talents.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.

talents.name: Prog Rock
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100 Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 Health every second while it is active.

talents.name: Block Party
talents.description: Rockstar gives allies a stack of Block, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

talents.name: Crowd Surfer
talents.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

talents.name: Loud Speakers
talents.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

talents.name: Speed Metal
talents.description: Rockstar also gives 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Pinball Wizard
talents.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

talents.name: Echo Pedal
talents.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability releases two pulses of 15 damage. This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

talents.name: Hammer-on
talents.description: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 35% more damage.

talents.name: Mosh Pit
talents.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Stage Dive
talents.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Mic Check
talents.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

talents.name: Encore
talents.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

talents.name: Face Smelt
talents.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 49.92% fading over 2 seconds.

talents.name: Show Stopper
talents.description: After using Powerslide, gain 15 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 15%.

talents.name: Aggressive Shredding
talents.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 second.

talents.name: Imposing Presence
talents.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Tour Bus
talents.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Crowd Pleaser
talents.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

talents.name: Death Metal
talents.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

talents.name: Storm Shield
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Bolt of the Storm
talents.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talents.name: Gathering Storm
talents.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5.

talents.name: Seasoned Marksman
talents.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

talents.name: Wingman
talents.description: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

talents.name: Static Shield
talents.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

talents.name: Updraft
talents.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range, Shield amount, and Shield duration by 40%.

talents.name: Hammer Gains
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

talents.name: Secret Weapon

talents.description: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby Allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple Allies provide additional time. Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

talents.name: Sonic Amplifier
talents.description: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's radius is increased by 50% for the duration.

talents.name: Boombox
talents.description: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It up. Crossfade tracks do not stack.

talents.name: Sound Barrier
talents.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1392 point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

talents.name: Reverse Amp
talents.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 112 damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%. This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4.0625 seconds.

talents.name: Beat Mixing
talents.description: After switching Crossfade tracks, if the next song plays for at least 1.5 seconds, Lúcio gains a 100 point Shield that lasts indefinitely. Switching tracks again removes the Shield.

talents.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
talents.description: While Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, Lúcio is immune to all enemy Slow and Root effects.

talents.name: Hard Style
talents.description: Gain 25 Armor while Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: Back in the Mix
talents.description: Heal for 260 upon entering a Stun, Silence, or Time Stop effect. This cannot happen more than once every 10 seconds.

talents.name: Rejuvenescência
talents.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 3.2% of the target's maximum health each second.

talents.name: Bring it Together
talents.description: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's Healing Boost is increased by 45% for the duration.

talents.name: Up the Frequency
talents.description: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced from 100 to 80 and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes also reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.45 seconds.

talents.name: Bossa Nova
talents.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds.

talents.name: Nonstop Remix
talents.description: While Reverse Amp is affecting at least 2 enemy Heroes, its duration lasts indefinitely.

talents.name: Bonus Track
talents.description: Swapping Crossfade tracks while Amp It Up is active will set Amp It Up back to its max duration. Can only happen once per cast.

talents.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
talents.description: The initial cast of Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from Allies, and also removes Slow and Root effects on Lúcio.

talents.name: Blossom Swell
talents.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's radius by 20%.

talents.name: Photosynthesis
talents.description: Crippling Spores returns 10 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

talents.name: Natural Perspective
talents.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

talents.name: Cruel Spores
talents.description: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 Mana is restored.

talents.name: Nimble Wisp
talents.description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

talents.name: Timelost Wisp
talents.description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

talents.name: Skybound Wisp
talents.description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

talents.name: Dividing Wisp
talents.description: The first time a Wisp is relocated, it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location.

talents.name: Siphoning Toxin
talents.description: As long as Nature's Toxin is active on an enemy, heal 18 Health a second.

talents.name: Wild Vigor
talents.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

talents.name: Splintered Spear
talents.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

talents.name: Nature's Culling
talents.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroes.

talents.name: Thornwood Vine
talents.description: Send forth vines that deal 164 damage to all enemies in a line. Stores up to 3 charges.

talents.name: Leaping Strike
talents.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Pestering Blossom
talents.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 50%.

talents.name: Unfair Advantage
talents.description: Nature's Toxin deals 50% more damage to Heroes that are slowed.

talents.name: Giant Killer
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: Greater Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Choking Pollen
talents.description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

talents.name: Star Wood Spear
talents.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Invigorating Spores
talents.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Attack Speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Let Them Wither
talents.description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 50% and causes it to no longer decay.

talents.name: Forest's Wrath
talents.description: Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30%, its speed by 20%, and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

talents.name: Boundless Stride
talents.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 20 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

talents.name: Galloping Gait
talents.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Abolish Magic
talents.description: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

talents.name: Shan'do's Clarity
talents.description: Reduces Innervate's cooldown by 8 seconds.

talents.name: Moonburn
talents.description: Increase Moonfire's damage to Minions by 75%. Repeatable Quest: Every 5 Minions killed nearby increase this bonus by 1%, up to 25%. After reaching a 25% bonus, Moonburn's bonus damage also applies to Mercenaries and Monsters.

talents.name: Scouting Drone
talents.description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Elune's Grace
talents.description: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 25%.

talents.name: Full Moonfire
talents.description: Increases Moonfire's radius by 50% and reduces its Mana cost by 5.

talents.name: Vengeful Roots
talents.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 70 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's damage per second by 8.

talents.name: Strangling Vines
talents.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources.

talents.name: Hindering Moonfire
talents.description: Moonfire slows targets by 25% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Lunar Shower
talents.description: Using Moonfire reduces the cooldown of the next Moonfire by 0.5 seconds, and increases the damage by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times and resets after 6 seconds.

talents.name: Tranquility
talents.description: Heals 80 Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

talents.name: Twilight Dream
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 374 damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds. Passive: Increases Malfurion's Mana Regeneration by 1.25.

talents.name: Life Seed
talents.description: Nearby damaged allied Heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

talents.name: Shrink Ray
talents.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Ice Block
talents.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Ysera's Gift
talents.description: While above 75% Health, Regrowth's additional healing-over-time is increased by 40%.

talents.name: Tenacious Roots
talents.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and roots targets for 0.25 seconds longer.

talents.name: Revitalize
talents.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Serenity
talents.description: Increases Tranquility's healing by 25% and it also restores 5 Mana per second.

talents.name: Astral Communion
talents.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location. Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream. Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

talents.name: Storm Shield
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: Death's Reach
talents.description: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%.

talents.name: On a Pale Horse
talents.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

talents.name: Fear the Reaper
talents.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Die Alone
talents.description: Soul Rip deals 75% more damage if it hits only one Hero and no other enemies.

talents.name: Throwing Shade
talents.description: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Death Shroud. Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 4 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

talents.name: Black Harvest
talents.description: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 150 seconds. Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Cold Hand
talents.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Mortality
talents.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: Touch of Death
talents.description: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Tormented Souls
talents.description: Gain 10 Armor and unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Last Rites
talents.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed while under the effect of Last Rites permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

talents.name: Soul Siphon
talents.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: Ethereal Existence
talents.description: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 40.

talents.name: Inevitable End
talents.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

talents.name: Shroud of Wisdom
talents.description: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Soul Collector
talents.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 50%.

talents.name: Massacre
talents.description: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

talents.name: Memento Mori
talents.description: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

talents.name: Reaper of Souls
talents.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 1 second. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns extend its duration by 4 seconds.

talents.name: Angel of Death
talents.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

talents.name: Final Curtain
talents.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

talents.name: No One Can Stop Death
talents.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

talents.name: Stable Portal
talents.description: Increases Portal duration by 50%.

talents.name: Portal Mastery
talents.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

talents.name: Raven’s Intellect
talents.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana Regeneration by 100%.

talents.name: Mage Armor
talents.description: The first time an Ally uses a Portal, they gain 50 Physical Armor against the next 3 enemy Heroic Basic Attacks for 5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Bird's Eye View
talents.description: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Dust of Appearance
talents.description: Activate to reveal enemy Heroes in the area surrounding Medivh for 10 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.

talents.name: Arcane Charge
talents.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 30% more damage.

talents.name: The Master's Touch
talents.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

talents.name: Arcane Explosion
talents.description: The first time Force of Will absorbs damage, it deals 183 damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Raven Familiar
talents.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies that use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero for 114 damage.

talents.name: Poly Bomb
talents.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

talents.name: Ley Line Seal
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Quickening
talents.description: Reduces Portal cooldown by 50%.

talents.name: Astral Projection
talents.description: Increases Portal cast range by 50%.

talents.name: Winds of Celerity
talents.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

talents.name: Circle of Protection
talents.description: An untalented Force of Will is also applied to allies near the target.

talents.name: Enduring Will
talents.description: Increases Force of Will duration by 33.3333%.

talents.name: Reabsorption
talents.description: Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 50% of the damage it absorbed.

talents.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
talents.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

talents.name: Medivh Cheats!
talents.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33.3333% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

talents.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
talents.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

talents.name: Arcane Brilliance
talents.description: Activate to instantly restore 200.2 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Invisibility
talents.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Block
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Perfect Storm
talents.description: Reduces Storm Bolt's Mana cost by 25%. Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

talents.name: Third Wind
talents.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 80 per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 159 per second Restoration.

talents.name: Sledgehammer
talents.description: Deals 400% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Destroys 4 ammo from Structures.

talents.name: Reverberation
talents.description: Increases the Attack Speed slow from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3 seconds.

talents.name: Crowd Control
talents.description: Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana, to a maximum of 9 targets.

talents.name: Thunder Burn
talents.description: Thunder Clap leaves a zone on the ground that explodes after 2 seconds dealing 48 damage and applying a 25% slow for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Piercing Bolt
talents.description: Penetrates through the first target hit, hitting 1 additional target.

talents.name: Landing Momentum
talents.description: Increases Muradin's Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds upon landing with Dwarf Toss.

talents.name: Skullcracker
talents.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target will stun them for 0.25 seconds. Passive: Increases Muradin's Basic Attack Speed by 25%.

talents.name: Iron-forged Momentum
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt and Thunderclap by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Avatar
talents.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 Health.

talents.name: Haymaker
talents.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 damage and knocking them aside.

talents.name: Burning Rage
talents.description: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Healing Static
talents.description: Muradin heals for 5% of his Max Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

talents.name: Thunder Strike
talents.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

talents.name: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Dwarf Launch
talents.description: Increases the range and impact radius of Dwarf Toss by 50%.

talents.name: Heavy Impact
talents.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are stunned for 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Give 'em the Axe!
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 60% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Imposing Presence
talents.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Stoneform
talents.description: Activate to heal Muradin for 40% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

talents.name: Unstoppable Force
talents.description: Increases the duration of Avatar by 30%, and the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows are reduced by 75% while in Avatar.

talents.name: Grand Slam
talents.description: Damage of Haymaker increased by 25%, Mana cost lowered by 40, and can store 2 charges.

talents.name: Hardened Shield
