talents.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

talents.name: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: Fish Eye
talents.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Egg Hunt
talents.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs. Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

talents.name: A Fishy Deal
talents.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

talents.name: Slime Time
talents.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed. Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125. Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

talents.name: Tufferfish
talents.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

talents.name: Living the Dream
talents.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

talents.name: Black Lagoon
talents.description: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

talents.name: Slippery When Wet
talents.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Reduce the cooldown of Safety Bubble by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Time to Krill
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

talents.name: March of the Murlocs
talents.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

talents.name: Octo-Grab
talents.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3.0625 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

talents.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
talents.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

talents.name: Fish Tank
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes grant Murky 75 Physical Armor against Heroes for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Egg Shell
talents.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

talents.name: Toxic Buildup
talents.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

talents.name: Fish Oil
talents.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

talents.name: Wrath of Cod
talents.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

talents.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
talents.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely

talents.name: ... And a Shark Too!
talents.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700%.

talents.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
talents.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

talents.name: Making Inky
talents.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

talents.name: Widowmakers
talents.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

talents.name: Pandemic
talents.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

talents.name: Thing of the Deep
talents.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

talents.name: Hexed Crawlers
talents.description: Corpse spiders restore 0.75% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

talents.name: Big Voodoo
talents.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

talents.name: Blood Ritual
talents.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 1.95% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

talents.name: Spirit of Arachyr
talents.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

talents.name: Dead Rush
talents.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Toads of Hugeness
talents.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 20% after each hop, up to a maximum of 80%.

talents.name: Gargantuan
talents.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 damage when summoned, attacks for 175.5 damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

talents.name: Ravenous Spirit
talents.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 206.8 damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

talents.name: Guardian Toads
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: Superstition
talents.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities, but lose 30 Physical Armor, taking 30% more damage from Basic Attacks.

talents.name: Ice Block
talents.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Spider Colony
talents.description: Corpse Spiders' cooldown recharges 100% faster while above 850 Health.

talents.name: Ring of Poison
talents.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 318.75 damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

talents.name: Soul Harvest
talents.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 5% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 25%. Lasts 15 seconds.

talents.name: Humongoid
talents.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

talents.name: Annihilating Spirit
talents.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

talents.name: Fury of the Storm
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talents.name: Vile Infection
talents.description: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual. Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 200%.

talents.name: Advanced Cloaking
talents.description: While Stealthed, Nova gains 2 Mana per second and 25% increased movement speed.

talents.name: Longshot
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

talents.name: Covert Ops
talents.description: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

talents.name: Remote Delivery
talents.description: Increases Holo Decoy cast range by 100% and its sight range by 50%

talents.name: Rapid Projection
talents.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

talents.name: Holo Stability
talents.description: Increases the duration of Holo Decoy by 120%.

talents.name: Covert Mission
talents.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

talents.name: One in the Chamber
talents.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 80% additional damage.

talents.name: Anti-Armor Shells
talents.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

talents.name: Snipe Master
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy Hero.

talents.name: Triple Tap
talents.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 damage each.

talents.name: Precision Strike
talents.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

talents.name: Double Tap
talents.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges.

talents.name: Psionic Efficiency
talents.description: Removes Snipe's Mana cost and increases its range by 10%.

talents.name: Explosive Round
talents.description: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

talents.name: Perfect Shot
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Crippling Shot
talents.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

talents.name: Lethal Decoy
talents.description: Holo Decoy deals 40% of Nova's damage.

talents.name: Fast Reload
talents.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

talents.name: Precision Barrage
talents.description: Precision Strike holds 2 charges with a 3 second cooldown between using each charge.

talents.name: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: Ghost Protocol
talents.description: Activate to gain Stealth and become Unrevealable for 2 seconds. Nova's attacks and Abilities will also not break Stealth during this time.

talents.name: Echo Pulse
talents.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

talents.name: Warp Resonance
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

talents.name: Gather Minerals
talents.description: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.  Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 25% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

talents.name: Photon Barrier
talents.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

talents.name: Turbo Charged
talents.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

talents.name: Shield Capacitor
talents.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

talents.name: Particle Accelerator
talents.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

talents.name: Rift Shock
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Tower Defense
talents.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

talents.name: Pylon Overcharge
talents.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

talents.name: Null Gate
talents.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

talents.name: Aggressive Matrix
talents.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

talents.name: Power Overflowing
talents.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

talents.name: Shield Battery
talents.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 24 Shields per second, up to 96. Shields persist for 4 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

talents.name: Quantum Entanglement
talents.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

talents.name: Gravity Well
talents.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

talents.name: Repulsor
talents.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

talents.name: Interference
talents.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Construct Additional Pylons
talents.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

talents.name: Gate Keeper
talents.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field. Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

talents.name: Shoot 'Em Up
talents.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.   Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

talents.name: Probius Loop
talents.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 2 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

talents.name: Sulfuras Hungers
talents.description: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30. Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

talents.name: Shifting Meteor
talents.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 3% increased damage from it. Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

talents.name: Engulfing Flame
talents.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

talents.name: Fire Ward
talents.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Slow Burn
talents.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Catching Fire
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: Hand of Ragnaros
talents.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Molten Power
talents.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

talents.name: Blistering Attacks
talents.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Sulfuras Smash
talents.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 damage. Enemies in the center take 594 damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Lava Wave
talents.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

talents.name: Cauterized Wounds
talents.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

talents.name: Tempered Flame
talents.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Resilient Flame
talents.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

talents.name: Giant Scorcher
talents.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

talents.name: Meteor Bomb
talents.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 damage to all nearby enemies.

talents.name: Blast Echo
talents.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

talents.name: Flames of Sulfuron
talents.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Lava Surge
talents.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

talents.name: Heroic Difficulty
talents.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

talents.name: Submerge
talents.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 Health over 3 seconds.

talents.name: Give Me More!
talents.description: Increases Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%.

talents.name: Seasoned Marksman
talents.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

talents.name: Scouting Drone
talents.description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Focused Attack
talents.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Vigorous Assault
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

talents.name: Confident Aim
talents.description: Lowers the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 4 seconds if it hits an enemy Hero.

talents.name: Relentless Leader
talents.description: Being Stunned or Rooted knocks away nearby enemies. This effect has a 8 second cooldown. Passive: The cooldown of Adrenaline Rush is reduced by 15 seconds.

talents.name: Hamstring Shot
talents.description: Enemies hit by Penetrating Round have a 20% Movement Speed slow for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Revolution Overdrive
talents.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire.  Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

talents.name: Fight or Flight
talents.description: Whenever Adrenaline Rush activates, it gives 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds.  Adrenaline Rush can also be manually activated.

talents.name: Puttin' On a Clinic
talents.description: Whenever an enemy Minion Raynor has recently damaged is destroyed, his Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Hyperion
talents.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

talents.name: Raynor's Raiders
talents.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 49.6 damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

talents.name: Giant Killer
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: Double-Barreled
talents.description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

talents.name: Steel Resolve
talents.description: Increases Inspire's duration by 50% and causes Adrenaline Rush to also apply Inspire.

talents.name: Executioner
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Cluster Round
talents.description: Penetrating Round damage is increased by 20% for each additional target hit up to 100%, and the width is increased by 50%.

talents.name: Bullseye
talents.description: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second.

talents.name: Scorched Earth
talents.description: An additional set of lasers blast the ground 5 times per second, dealing 40 damage in an area.

talents.name: Dusk Wings
talents.description: Banshees remain Stealthed while attacking and fire 50% more frequently.

talents.name: A Card to Play
talents.description: Whenever a Hero (ally or enemy) is killed, the cooldown of Raynor's Heroic Ability is reduced by 15 seconds.

talents.name: Nexus Frenzy
talents.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

talents.name: Colossal Totem
talents.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

talents.name: Electric Charge
talents.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

talents.name: Wolf Run
talents.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

talents.name: Lightning Bond
talents.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.

talents.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
talents.description: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 65 to 45.

talents.name: Feral Heart
talents.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

talents.name: Stormcaller
talents.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 40.

talents.name: Healing Totem
talents.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Blood and Thunder
talents.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Farsight
talents.description: Activate to reveal an area for 10 seconds.  Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Cleanse
talents.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

talents.name: Totemic Projection
talents.description: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

talents.name: Ancestral Healing
talents.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1552 Health. Cannot be used on Rehgar.

talents.name: Bloodlust
talents.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

talents.name: Earth Shield
talents.description: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Tidal Waves
talents.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 1 second for each Hero healed.

talents.name: Earthliving Enchant
talents.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 200 Health over 5 seconds.

talents.name: Earthgrasp Totem
talents.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

talents.name: Hunger of the Wolf
talents.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

talents.name: Rising Storm
talents.description: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 10%. Stacks up to 20 times.

talents.name: Farseer's Blessing
talents.description: Increases healing amount by 50%. Allies near the target are healed for 50% of the amount of health regained.

talents.name: Gladiator's War Shout
talents.description: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

talents.name: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: Storm Shield
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Easy Prey
talents.description: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Bird of Prey
talents.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

talents.name: Flare
talents.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

talents.name: Hungry Bear
talents.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

talents.name: Hunter-Gatherer
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 10 Armor.

talents.name: Grizzled Fortitude
talents.description: Every 7 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

talents.name: Animal Husbandry
talents.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 25 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

talents.name: Aspect of the Beast
talents.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.25 seconds.

talents.name: Crippling Talons
talents.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3 seconds.

talents.name: Taking Flight
talents.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Bestial Wrath
talents.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

talents.name: Unleash the Boars
talents.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Wildfire Bear
talents.description: Misha deals 28 damage per second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Aspect of the Hawk
talents.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Dire Beast
talents.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 40%, stacking up to a 400% bonus.

talents.name: Thrill of the Hunt
talents.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Primal Intimidation
talents.description: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Feign Death
talents.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

talents.name: Spirit Bond
talents.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

talents.name: Kill Command
talents.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
talents.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

talents.name: Hardened Skin
talents.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

talents.name: Way of Illusion
talents.description: Quest: Every time one of Samuro's Images Critically Strikes a Hero, he gains 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, he gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

talents.name: Way of the Blade
talents.description: Critical Strike now happens every 3rd Basic Attack and deals an additional 20% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage.

talents.name: Way of the Wind
talents.description: Quest: Attacking a Hero from Stealth increases the Movement Speed bonus of Wind Walk by 1.25%, up to 24.8%. Reward: After attacking 20 Heroes, Wind Walk's Unrevealable duration is increased to 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Mirage
talents.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

talents.name: One With The Wind
talents.description: While Stealthed, gain 60 Armor, taking 60% reduced damage from all sources.

talents.name: Deflection
talents.description: Advancing Strikes grants 25 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 25%.

talents.name: Burning Blade
talents.description: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 65% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

talents.name: Phantom Pain
talents.description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 40% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage for each Image that is active.

talents.name: Crushing Blows
talents.description: Critical Strike now has two charges, and Critical Strikes deal an additional 25% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage.

talents.name: Bladestorm
talents.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Illusion Master
talents.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the target Mirror Image. Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of Samuro's damage.

talents.name: Mirrored Steel
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

talents.name: Kawarimi
talents.description: Wind Walk creates an Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

talents.name: Shukuchi
talents.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

talents.name: Merciless Strikes
talents.description: Basic Attacks against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets are always Critical Strikes.

talents.name: Harsh Winds
talents.description: Attacking a Hero from Stealth causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro and his Images for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Press the Attack
talents.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Basic Attacks increase Samuro's Attack Speed by 15%, up to 60%.

talents.name: Dance Of Death
talents.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does.

talents.name: Three Blade Style
talents.description: Samuro's Images gain an additional 50% of his Health and last up to 36 seconds.

talents.name: Wind Strider
talents.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

talents.name: Blademaster’s Pursuit
talents.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Advanced Artillery
talents.description: Increase the damage bonus to long distance enemies by 10%.

talents.name: Resistant
talents.description: Being Stunned or Rooted while in Siege Mode grants 50 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Ambush
talents.description: Stealth when entering Siege Mode. Sgt. Hammer's next Basic Attack from Siege Mode will deal 100% more damage. Lose Stealth when Basic Attacking, using an Ability, taking damage, or returning to Tank Mode.

talents.name: Regeneration Master
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 5 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

talents.name: Vigorous Assault
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

talents.name: Focused Attack
talents.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Excessive Force
talents.description: Double the knock back distance.

talents.name: Mine Field
talents.description: Increase the number of mines by 2.

talents.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
talents.description: Reduce the cooldown of Thrusters by 15 seconds.

talents.name: First Aid
talents.description: Activate to heal 35.49% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

talents.name: Blunt Force Gun
talents.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 damage to enemies in its path.

talents.name: Napalm Strike
talents.description: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Giant Killer
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

talents.name: First Strike
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 25% more damage if Sgt. Hammer hasn't been attacked within the last 5 seconds.

talents.name: Bullhead Mines
talents.description: Middle Spider Mine knocks target back a short distance.

talents.name: Barricade
talents.description: Create a wall of path blocking debris for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Executioner
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Hover Siege Mode
talents.description: Sgt. Hammer can move at 50% Movement Speed in Siege Mode.

talents.name: Graduating Range
talents.description: While in Siege Mode, Sgt. Hammer's Attack range increases by 1.1 every 3 seconds, up to 5.5.

talents.name: Stoneskin
talents.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Orbital BFG
talents.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

talents.name: Advanced Lava Strike
talents.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

talents.name: Fury of the Storm
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talents.name: Nexus Frenzy
talents.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

talents.name: War Paint
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal Sonya for 30% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: Block
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Shot of Fury
talents.description: Increases maximum Fury by 50. Sonya's Trait can be activated to gain 50 Fury.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

talents.name: Focused Attack
talents.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Shattered Ground
talents.description: Increases Seismic Slam splash damage to 75% of primary target damage.

talents.name: Hurricane
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Whirlwind by 1 second and Whirlwind removes all slows and roots on Sonya.

talents.name: Mercenary Lord
talents.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Poisoned Spear
talents.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 150% damage over 6 seconds.

talents.name: Composite Spear
talents.description: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30% and increases Fury generated by 20.

talents.name: Follow Through
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: Ferocious Healing
talents.description: Consume 20 Fury to heal 10.15% of Sonya's maximum Health. Usable while Whirlwinding.

talents.name: Leap
talents.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

talents.name: Wrath of the Berserker
talents.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

talents.name: Life Funnel
talents.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

talents.name: Aftershock
talents.description: Using Seismic Slam reduces its Fury cost by 50% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Mystical Spear
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 3 seconds. Sonya is pulled to the target location even if an enemy isn't hit.

talents.name: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Furious Blow
talents.description: Increases Seismic Slam damage by 50%, but costs 40 Fury.

talents.name: No Escape
talents.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

talents.name: Imposing Presence
talents.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Nerves of Steel
talents.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

talents.name: Arreat Crater
talents.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

talents.name: Anger Management
talents.description: Increases all Fury generated during Wrath of the Berserker by 100%.

talents.name: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: Ignore Pain
talents.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.

talents.name: Chew Your Food
talents.description: Using Devour also heals Stitches for 9.555% of his max Health over 3.0625 seconds.

talents.name: Dampen Magic
talents.description: Every 8 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Hungry for More
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30, up to 900.  Reward: Upon gathering 30 Globes, increase Movement Speed by 10%.

talents.name: Heavy Slam
talents.description: Slam damage increased by 40%

talents.name: Amplified Healing
talents.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

talents.name: Restorative Fumes
talents.description: Whenever Vile Gas damages an enemy Hero, Stitches is healed for 27 Health.

talents.name: Putrid Ground
talents.description: Enemies hit by Slam are infected with Vile Gas.

talents.name: Savor the Flavor
talents.description: Quest: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 2 per second.

talents.name: Last Bite
talents.description: If an enemy dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by Devour, its cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds.

talents.name: Tenderizer
talents.description: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Toxic Gas
talents.description: Increases Vile Gas' radius by 25% and its damage by 50%.

talents.name: Putrid Bile
talents.description: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

talents.name: Gorge
talents.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.  Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

talents.name: Flea Bag
talents.description: Whenever Stitches is stunned or rooted, his Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 6 seconds.

talents.name: Mega Smash
talents.description: Range and arc of Slam increased by 25%.

talents.name: Indigestion
talents.description: Using Devour also creates a Retchling that applies Vile Gas Poison when it attacks.

talents.name: Pulverize
talents.description: Decreases Slam's cooldown by 2 seconds and it also slows enemies by 75% for 1 second.

talents.name: Fishing Hook
talents.description: Hook has an additional 40% range.

talents.name: Shish Kabob
talents.description: Hook can pull up to 2 targets.

talents.name: Stoneskin
talents.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Potent Bile
talents.description: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its slow amount is increased from 35% to 45%.

talents.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
talents.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

talents.name: Hardened Shield
talents.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

talents.name: Cannibalize
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Stitches for 5% of his maximum Health.

talents.name: Spine Launcher
talents.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 50% less damage.

talents.name: Fetid Touch
talents.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pusule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

talents.name: Growing Infestation
talents.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

talents.name: Poppin' Pustules
talents.description: Quest: Detonate 10 Weighted Pustules without dying. Reward: Detonating a Weighted Pustule now applies its damage and Slow in an area.

talents.name: One Good Spread...
talents.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 40 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Top Off
talents.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time on its initial target is increased by 50% while they are above 60% Health.

talents.name: Biotic Armor
talents.description: Healing Pathogen grants 50 Physical Armor to its initial target while active on them.

talents.name: Vigorous Reuptake
talents.description: Quest: Detonate 50 Healing Pathogens with Bio-Kill Switch. Reward: Increase Bio-Kill Switch's healing by 40%.

talents.name: The Long Pitch
talents.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 100%.

talents.name: Within My Reach
talents.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 50%.

talents.name: It Hungers
talents.description: Each time an enemy Hero is hit by Lurking Arm, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds, up to 6.5 seconds, and restore 5 Mana.

talents.name: Targeted Excision
talents.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.

talents.name: Flailing Swipe
talents.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

talents.name: Massive Shove
talents.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 200 damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

talents.name: Reactive Ballistospores
talents.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

talents.name: Low Blow
talents.description: Lurking Arm deals 150% more damage to enemy Heroes below 25% Health.

talents.name: Lingering Spines
talents.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

talents.name: Virulent Reaction
talents.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Superstrain
talents.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned, they are instantly healed for 250 Health.

talents.name: Universal Carrier
talents.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 60%.

talents.name: Pox Populi
talents.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

talents.name: Eye Infection
talents.description: Increase the final damage of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Additionally, detonating a Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch Blinds the target for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Controlled Chaos
talents.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range. Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

talents.name: Push Comes To Shove
talents.description: Massive Shove travels 25% faster. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

talents.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
talents.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Overflowing Quiver
talents.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, a free Withering Fire is shot. This cannot hit Heroes.

talents.name: Dreadful Wake
talents.description: Haunting Wave's application of Black Arrow on Minions and Mercenaries increases the duration to 7 seconds. Haunting Wave restores 5 Mana per Minion or Mercenary hit.

talents.name: Mercenary Queen
talents.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage.

talents.name: Withering Barrage
talents.description: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

talents.name: With the Wind
talents.description: Increases Withering Fire's range by 25%.

talents.name: Lost Soul
talents.description: Reduce Shadow Dagger's cooldown by 1.25 seconds each time it spreads to a Hero.

talents.name: Barbed Shot
talents.description: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talents.name: Unstable Poison
talents.description: Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 116 damage to nearby enemies.  Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

talents.name: Possession
talents.description: Force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Stores up to 3 charges.

talents.name: Wailing Arrow
talents.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

talents.name: Mind Control
talents.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Life Drain
talents.description: Shadow Dagger heals Sylvanas for 37 each time it spreads to an enemy.

talents.name: Windrunner
talents.description: Teleporting with Haunting Wave fully recharges Withering Fire. Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting.

talents.name: Will of the Forsaken
talents.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Evasive Fire
talents.description: When an enemy is hit with Withering Fire, gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

talents.name: Cold Embrace
talents.description: Shadow Dagger lowers the Armor of the initial enemy by 25 for 2 seconds, causing them to take 25% more damage.

talents.name: Overwhelming Affliction
talents.description: Black Arrows now also applies to Heroes, slowing their Movement Speed by 6% for the duration. Stacks up to 5 times.

talents.name: Remorseless
talents.description: After using an Ability, Sylvanas's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: Deafening Blast
talents.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

talents.name: Dark Lady's Call
talents.description: Mind Controlled enemies gain 100% Movement Speed for the duration.

talents.name: Fury of the Storm
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talents.name: Bolt of the Storm
talents.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talents.name: Psi-Infusion
talents.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every Non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%

talents.name: Templar's Will
talents.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 150%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

talents.name: Khaydarin Resonance
talents.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

talents.name: Khala's Celerity
talents.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Khala's Embrace
talents.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

talents.name: Khala's Light
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 15 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 15% less damage.

talents.name: Psionic Projection
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

talents.name: Resonation
talents.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

talents.name: Mental Acuity
talents.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

talents.name: Archon
talents.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 175 damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 87.5 damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10.5 seconds. Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

talents.name: Force Wall
talents.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

talents.name: Deep Shift
talents.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

talents.name: Adun's Wisdom
talents.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

talents.name: Nullification
talents.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals  by 75% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Phase Disruption
talents.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

talents.name: Psionic Echo
talents.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first.

talents.name: Focused Beam
talents.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

talents.name: Twilight Archon
talents.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Force Barrier
talents.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: Prismatic Link
talents.description: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 50% damage.

talents.name: Shield Battery
talents.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

talents.name: Invigoration
talents.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

talents.name: Block
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Chop Meat
talents.description: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions and Mercenaries.

talents.name: Flail Axe
talents.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

talents.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33.3333% upon impact.

talents.name: Cheap Shot
talents.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

talents.name: Insatiable Blade
talents.description: While facing the branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

talents.name: Victuals
talents.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

talents.name: Meat Shield
talents.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Furnace Blast
talents.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 damage to enemies. Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

talents.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
talents.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Cleaver
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

talents.name: Savage Charge
talents.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: Brutal Strike
talents.description: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

talents.name: Crippling Slam
talents.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

talents.name: Enraged
talents.description: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 15 Armor, reducing damage taken by 15%. This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

talents.name: Blood Frenzy
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

talents.name: Fires of Hell
talents.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

talents.name: Slaughterhouse
talents.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

talents.name: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: Bolt of the Storm
talents.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

talents.name: Olaf the Stout
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Spy Games
talents.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

talents.name: Explosive Attacks
talents.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

talents.name: Viking Bribery
talents.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster. Current number of Bribe stacks:

talents.name: Pain Don't Hurt
talents.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

talents.name: Erik the Swift
talents.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 Health per second.

talents.name: It's a Sabotage!
talents.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 10 seconds, causing 135 damage and destroying 5 Ammo.

talents.name: Mercenary Lord
talents.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

talents.name: Baleog the Fierce
talents.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

talents.name: Spin To Win!
talents.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Norse Force!
talents.description: All Vikings gain a 110 to 220 point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

talents.name: Longboat Raid!
talents.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds. Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

talents.name: Play Again!
talents.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

talents.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
talents.description: Olaf deals 34 damage every second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Jump!
talents.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Nordic Attack Squad
talents.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Large and In Charge
talents.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

talents.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
talents.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

talents.name: 64 KB Marathon
talents.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

talents.name: Executioner
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
talents.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

talents.name: Checkpoint Reached
talents.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

talents.name: The Sequel!
talents.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

talents.name: Fury of the Storm
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 damage to the target, and 105 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

talents.name: Echo of the Elements
talents.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning. Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 45 to 25. Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

talents.name: Crash Lightning
talents.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 480. Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 20 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

talents.name: Rolling Thunder
talents.description: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana. Passive: Increase the range of Chain Lightning by 30% and the number of bounces by 1.

talents.name: Feral Resilience
talents.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience, and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack. Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

talents.name: Frostwolf Pack
talents.description: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

talents.name: Mana Tide
talents.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Maelstrom Weapon
talents.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

talents.name: Ancestral Wrath
talents.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt. Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

talents.name: Follow Through
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: Sundering
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1 second.

talents.name: Earthquake
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

talents.name: Grace Of Air
talents.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

talents.name: Frostwolf's Grace
talents.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount. Frostwolf's Grace's activation has a 15 second cooldown.

talents.name: Spirit Shield
talents.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Tempest Fury
talents.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

talents.name: Thunderstorm
talents.description: Casting Chain Lightning on a Hero other than the last Hero it was cast on causes it to Slow targets by 8% for 2 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Each consecutive cast against a new Hero increases this bonus by 8%, up to 40%. Bonuses are reset if Thrall dies or casts Chain Lightning on the same Hero twice. Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's initial damage is increased by 25%.

talents.name: Alpha Wolf
talents.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage. Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Worldbreaker
talents.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Earthen Shields
talents.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their max Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

talents.name: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: Wind Rush
talents.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

talents.name: Pulse Strike
talents.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

talents.name: Slipstream
talents.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

talents.name: Tracer Rounds
talents.description: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Parting Gift
talents.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 damage each to different targets.

talents.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
talents.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

talents.name: Untouchable
talents.description: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

talents.name: Jumper
talents.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1.

talents.name: Bullet Time
talents.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

talents.name: Spatial Echo
talents.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

talents.name: Sticky Bomb
talents.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Quantum Spike
talents.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 10% of the primary target's maximum Health.

talents.name: Pulse Rounds
talents.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

talents.name: Bullet Spray
talents.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

talents.name: Ricochet
talents.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

talents.name: Leeching Rounds
talents.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

talents.name: Sleight of Hand
talents.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

talents.name: Focus Fire
talents.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94.5 bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

talents.name: Locked and Loaded
talents.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

talents.name: Get Stuffed!
talents.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

talents.name: Total Recall
talents.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

talents.name: Composition B
talents.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

talents.name: Press the Advantage
talents.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Dash
talents.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds.  Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

talents.name: Combat Tactician
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

talents.name: In the Rhythm
talents.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

talents.name: Fully Loaded
talents.description: Reduce Minigun's cooldown by 5 seconds.

talents.name: The Bigger They Are...
talents.description: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

talents.name: Master Assassin
talents.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

talents.name: Quarterback
talents.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

talents.name: Concussion Grenade
talents.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

talents.name: Relentless Soldier
talents.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: Commandeer Odin
talents.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

talents.name: Drakken Laser Drill
talents.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

talents.name: That's the Stuff!
talents.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

talents.name: Neosteel Coating
talents.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

talents.name: Spray 'n' Pray
talents.description: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

talents.name: Titan Grenade
talents.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: Lead Rain
talents.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

talents.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
talents.description: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

talents.name: Big Red Button
talents.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later.

talents.name: Focusing Diodes
talents.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

talents.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

talents.name: Bob and Weave
talents.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

talents.name: Purge Evil
talents.description: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

talents.name: Protection in Death
talents.description: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Even In Death
talents.description: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

talents.name: Regeneration Master
talents.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 5 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

talents.name: Horadric Reforging
talents.description: If El'druin's Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: Swift Retribution
talents.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

talents.name: Vigorous Strike
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

talents.name: Angel's Grace
talents.description: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Reciprocate
talents.description: When Righteousness expires, it explodes for 170 damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Zealotry
talents.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Follow Through
talents.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: Judgment
talents.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 damage.

talents.name: Sanctification
talents.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

talents.name: Burning Rage
talents.description: Deal 23 damage per second to nearby enemies.

talents.name: Angelic Absorption
talents.description: Enemies that attack Tyrael while shielded grant 240 Health over 4 seconds.

talents.name: Angelic Might
talents.description: Gain 80% increased damage on Tyrael's next Basic Attack for each Hero hit by Smite.

talents.name: Blade of Justice
talents.description: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, Tyrael's Attack Speed is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Holy Ground
talents.description: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

talents.name: Salvation
talents.description: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 45%.

talents.name: Blood for Blood
talents.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

talents.name: Angel of Justice
talents.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

talents.name: Holy Arena
talents.description: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

talents.name: Nullification Shield
talents.description: Activate to gain 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: Ranger
talents.description:
Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals more damage based on the distance traveled, up to 75%.
Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Sentinel increases the maximum damage bonus by 3%.

talents.name: Lunar Blaze
talents.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting Heroes with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 3%. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Lunar Flare no longer has a Mana cost. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

talents.name: Ranger's Mark
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 1 second.

talents.name: Moonlit Arrows
talents.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Celestial Attunement
talents.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns and Silences from its target. When a Stun is removed this way, Light of Elune may be used for free within 4 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Celestial Attunement.

talents.name: Kaldorei Resistance
talents.description: Light of Elune grants the target 15 Spell Armor for 6 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

talents.name: Huntress' Fury
talents.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby Heroes and Mercenaries.

talents.name: Darnassian Archery
talents.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 5% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

talents.name: Trueshot Aura
talents.description: Passively grant 10% increased Attack Damage to nearby allied Heroes. Activate to double this bonus for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Shadowstalk
talents.description: Stealth all allied Heroes and heal them for 240 over 8 seconds.  At the conclusion of Shadowstalk, they receive a burst of 95 healing.

talents.name: Starfall
talents.description: Deal 91 damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

talents.name: Quickening Blessing
talents.description: Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Empower
talents.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 4 seconds. Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 4 seconds each time it hits a Hero.

talents.name: Harsh Moonlight
talents.description: Sentinel Slows the target by 25% and reduces their damage dealt by 25% for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Overflowing Light
talents.description: While Tyrande is above 60% Health, Light of Elune's healing is increased by 30%.

talents.name: Mark of Mending
talents.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: Elune’s Chosen
talents.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Eyes of the Huntress
talents.description: After casting Shadowstalk, reveal all enemy Heroes for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Celestial Wrath
talents.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes hit.

talents.name: Shooting Star
talents.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Every 10 Basic Attack against Heroes casts a free Lunar Flare at a random Hero near Tyrande's position.

talents.name: Iceblade Arrows
talents.description: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

talents.name: Silver Touch
talents.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

talents.name: Wave of Light
talents.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 second. Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

talents.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
talents.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 second. Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

talents.name: Holy Shock
