talents.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

talents.name: Pursuit of Justice
talents.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Holy Fire
talents.description: Deal 14 damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

talents.name: Armor of Faith
talents.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
talents.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.

talents.name: Hand of Protection
talents.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

talents.name: Divine Shield
talents.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Divine Storm
talents.description: Deal 187 damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

talents.name: Blessed Champion
talents.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

talents.name: Well Met
talents.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Beacon of Light
talents.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

talents.name: Tyr's Deliverance
talents.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Benediction
talents.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

talents.name: Bulwark of Light
talents.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talents.name: Divine Hurricane
talents.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talents.name: Redemption
talents.description: After Eternal Devotion ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

talents.name: Divine Protection
talents.description: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.

talents.name: Vigor
talents.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 2 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

talents.name: Subtlety
talents.description: After remaining Vanished for at least 4 seconds, using Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote causes Valeera to regenerate an additional 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Combat Readiness
talents.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 3 charges.

talents.name: Crippling Poison
talents.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds. Activating Crippling Poison does not break Vanish.

talents.name: Relentless Strikes
talents.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.

talents.name: Hemorrhage
talents.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 25% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

talents.name: Initiative
talents.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 1 Combo Points.

talents.name: Wound Poison
talents.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to also reduce healing received by the victim by 50% for 5 seconds. Activating Wound Poison does not break Vanish.

talents.name: Mutilate
talents.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 100% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

talents.name: Fatal Finesse
talents.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 3, up to 60. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

talents.name: Slice and Dice
talents.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes Valeera's next 3 Basic Attacks to have their Attack Speed increased by 150%. Lasts 3 seconds.

talents.name: Assassinate
talents.description: Ambush deals 100% additional damage if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

talents.name: Smoke Bomb
talents.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

talents.name: Cloak of Shadows
talents.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

talents.name: Elusiveness
talents.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 10%.

talents.name: Death From Above
talents.description: Ambush now has 6 range and teleports Valeera behind the victim.

talents.name: Blind
talents.description: When Cheap Shot expires, the victim is blinded for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Strangle
talents.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 25% for 7 seconds.

talents.name: Seal Fate
talents.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

talents.name: Rupture
talents.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks increase the damage over time effect of Garrote by 5%, stacking up to 30%, and refresh the duration.

talents.name: Expose Armor
talents.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes them to lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

talents.name: Thistle Tea
talents.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy. Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish.

talents.name: Adrenaline Rush
talents.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 30 Energy per second.

talents.name: Enveloping Shadows
talents.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

talents.name: Nightslayer
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Monster Hunter
talents.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

talents.name: Caltrops
talents.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 180 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

talents.name: Hot Pursuit
talents.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

talents.name: Puncturing Arrow
talents.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

talents.name: Punishment
talents.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

talents.name: Creed of the Hunter
talents.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

talents.name: Arsenal
talents.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Death Dealer
talents.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

talents.name: Repeating Arrow
talents.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

talents.name: Strafe
talents.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Rain of Vengeance
talents.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

talents.name: Siphoning Arrow
talents.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

talents.name: Tempered by Discipline
talents.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: Gloom
talents.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds. Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

talents.name: Frost Shot
talents.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Seething Hatred
talents.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Manticore
talents.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

talents.name: Death Siphon
talents.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

talents.name: Storm of Vengeance
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

talents.name: Rancor
talents.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

talents.name: Farflight Quiver
talents.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

talents.name: Lion's Maw
talents.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

talents.name: Overpower
talents.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 20% more damage.

talents.name: High King's Quest
talents.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Base Attack Damage.

talents.name: Shield Wall
talents.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage for the duration.

talents.name: Warbringer
talents.description: Reduces Charge cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost by 50%.

talents.name: Live by the Sword
talents.description: Increase the duration of Parry by 40%. If at least 4 Hero Basic Attacks are blocked with a single Parry, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1.17% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: Victory Rush
talents.description: Every 60 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 400 Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

talents.name: Taunt
talents.description: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds. Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%. Passive: Gain 15 Armor.

talents.name: Colossus Smash
talents.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage. Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

talents.name: Twin Blades of Fury
talents.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds. Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

talents.name: Juggernaut
talents.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: Mortal Strike
talents.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Shattering Throw
talents.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 damage, and up to 1400 bonus damage to their Shields. Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields.

talents.name: Banner of Stormwind
talents.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

talents.name: Banner of Ironforge
talents.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

talents.name: Banner of Dalaran
talents.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

talents.name: Vigilance
talents.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

talents.name: Master at Arms
talents.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

talents.name: Frenzy
talents.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

talents.name: Glory to the Alliance
talents.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

talents.name: Demoralizing Shout
talents.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 25% for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Backlash
talents.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: Shackler
talents.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Shade
talents.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

talents.name: Reaper’s Toll
talents.description: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Grim Scythe
talents.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

talents.name: Jailors
talents.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors. These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 50% Movement and Attack Speed.

talents.name: Harvest Vitality
talents.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 60% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

talents.name: Weaken
talents.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

talents.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
talents.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.5% of his maximum Mana.

talents.name: Poison Nova
talents.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

talents.name: Skeletal Mages
talents.description: Vector Targeting Summons 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 46.875 damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

talents.name: Echoes of Death
talents.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

talents.name: Rapid Harvest
talents.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

talents.name: Executioner
talents.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Amplify Damage
talents.description: Enemies rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds, taking 25% increased damage.

talents.name: Corpse Explosion
talents.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

talents.name: Bone Spear
talents.description: Deal 230 damage to enemies in a line.

talents.name: Andariel’s Visage
talents.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt. Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

talents.name: Cold Hand of Death
talents.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%. Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Mortal Wound
talents.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Kalan’s Edict
talents.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

talents.name: Volatile Acid
talents.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

talents.name: Corpse Feeders
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 40% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

talents.name: Infest
talents.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

talents.name: Envenomed Spines
talents.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 damage over 5 seconds.

talents.name: Medusa Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

talents.name: Serrated Spines
talents.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

talents.name: Baneling Massacre
talents.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings.

talents.name: Viscous Acid
talents.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

talents.name: Bile Drop
talents.description: Quest: Passively increases the damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases this bonus by 5%. Reward: Upon reaching 150% bonus damage, increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

talents.name: Devouring Maw
talents.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

talents.name: Nydus Network
talents.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

talents.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
talents.description: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

talents.name: Protective Coating
talents.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

talents.name: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Brood Expansion
talents.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 6 seconds.

talents.name: Corrosive Saliva
talents.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

talents.name: Mutalisk
talents.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

talents.name: Tyrant Maw
talents.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and getting a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

talents.name: Endless Creep
talents.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

talents.name: Fury of the Storm
talents.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 damage to the target, and 228 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

talents.name: Demolitions Expert
talents.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.438 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds. Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

talents.name: Together We Are Strong
talents.description: Every 6 damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 30 Energy per shield.

talents.name: Feel the Heat
talents.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

talents.name: Maximum Charge
talents.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy. Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy. Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

talents.name: I Am the Strongest
talents.description: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 damage.

talents.name: Give Me Twenty
talents.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently.  Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Speed Barrier
talents.description: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

talents.name: Defensive Shielding
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

talents.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
talents.description: Particle Grenade deals 40% more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

talents.name: Explosive Barrier
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 damage to nearby enemies.

talents.name: To the Limit
talents.description: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

talents.name: Hit Me
talents.description: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

talents.name: Graviton Surge
talents.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

talents.name: Expulsion Zone
talents.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

talents.name: Unstoppable Competitor
talents.description: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

talents.name: Spell Barrier
talents.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

talents.name: Endurance Training
talents.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

talents.name: Pain is Temporary
talents.description: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal shield active on herself at a time.

talents.name: Plasma Shock
talents.description: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

talents.name: Cleansing Shield
talents.description: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Gain Train
talents.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

talents.name: Born in Battle
talents.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

talents.name: Gravity Kills
talents.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 175 damage over the duration.

talents.name: Clear Out
talents.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by 15% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 15 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

talents.name: Grenadier
talents.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

talents.name: Unyielding Defender
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

talents.name: Greater Cleave
talents.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

talents.name: Vorpal Blade
talents.description: Activate to teleport to the last non-structure target attacked within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

talents.name: Shadow Hunter
talents.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 2 . Reward: Upon gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

talents.name: Grim Task
talents.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Spell Power by 5%, up to 50%. This bonus Spell Power is lost on death.

talents.name: Rending Cleave
talents.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

talents.name: Combo Slash
talents.description: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

talents.name: Wormhole
talents.description: For 2.125 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

talents.name: Slip into Shadow
talents.description: Blink gains an additional charge, but its cooldown is increased by 8 seconds.

talents.name: Seeker in the Dark
talents.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Shadow Assault
talents.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Void Prison
talents.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

talents.name: Shroud of Adun
talents.description: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

talents.name: Spell Shield
talents.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

talents.name: Mending Strikes
talents.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

talents.name: Master Warp-Blade
talents.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

talents.name: Void Slash
talents.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Sentenced to Death
talents.description: Deal 40% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

talents.name: Nerazim Fury
talents.description: Shadow Assault grants 30% Life Steal, and the duration is increased by 50%.

talents.name: Gift of the Xel’Naga
talents.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

talents.name: Nexus Blades
talents.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

talents.name: Rewind
talents.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

talents.name: Boneslicer
talents.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies, and the bonus damage is increased by 30%.

talents.name: Arcanite Axes
talents.description: Lower the cooldown of Twin Cleave by 0.75 seconds for every Hero hit. Passive: When below 0% Health, Spell Power is increased by 25%.

talents.name: You Want Axe?
talents.description: Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 1.25. Reward: After attacking Heroes 120 times, his Attack Range is increased by 1.1.

talents.name: Troll's Blood
talents.description: Regeneration heal amount increased by 74.9645%.

talents.name: Let the Killing Begin
talents.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 6%, up to 30%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration. Hero Takedowns instantly grant 30% Attack Speed.

talents.name: Headhunter
talents.description: Quest: Get a takedown on all unique enemy Heroes. Reward: Activate to reveal all enemy Heroes for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Vicious Assault
talents.description: Increases the number of bonus damage Basic Attack hits from Grievous Throw to 6. Basic Attacks against afflicted Heroes reduces the Cooldown of Grievous Throw by 2 seconds.

talents.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
talents.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave Axes at the same time, they take 150 bonus damage.

talents.name: Recklessness
talents.description: While Zul'jin is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 25%.

talents.name: Taz'dingo!
talents.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

talents.name: Guillotine
talents.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

talents.name: Eye of Zul'jin
talents.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Grievous Throw increases Zul'jin's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Forest Medicine
talents.description: Regeneration no longer has to be channeled, allowing Zul'jin to perform other actions while Regenerating. However, taking damage will still end the effect.

talents.name: Voodoo Shuffle
talents.description: Activate to remove all current Root and Slow effects on Zul'jin.

talents.name: Swirling Death
talents.description: Twin Cleave's Axes cycle twice and can hit enemies on each revolution, but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

talents.name: Lacerate
talents.description: Increases the slow amount of each Twin Cleave Axe by an additional 15%.

talents.name: Ferocity
talents.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 35%.

talents.name: Amani Resilience
talents.description: When Taz'dingo ends, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

talents.name: Buzzsaw
talents.description: After impact, the Guillotine continues forward, dealing 50% of Guillotine's damage to enemies in the line.

talents.name: Ensnare
talents.description: Throw a net forward, rooting the first enemy hit for 3 seconds.
